subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre said he had no intention of coming out of retirement to play again in the N.F.L. Favre, speaking to employees at a Wrangler plant in Hackleburg, Ala.
snippet: Brett Favre said he had no intention of coming out of retirement to play again in the N.F.L. Favre, speaking to employees at a Wrangler plant in Hackleburg, Ala.
